data.Name: I Was Given Feet To Follow You
data.Bio: “I Was Given Feet To Follow You” is the project of 28-year-old California native Dylan Andersen. With a penchant for ambient noise, underlying melody, and odd distraction, Andersen has cast his biggest shadow yet: a DIY ambient/post-rock project with the aim of introducing the world to his form of reality. Started as an idea after the exit from his post-hardcore band, Capistrano, in mid-2007, “I Was Given Feet To Follow You” was the perfect outlet to use to continue to write music on his own terms. Read more on Last.fm
